983440.name: War Thunder - T-34-85E, 1945 Pack
983440.description:
This Pack includes:

  • T-34-85E with mesh screens (Rank 4 USSR);
  • Premium account for 15 days.

Field modernization of the T-34-85E, 1945 with mesh screens whiсh supposed to protect the tank from faustpatrone in urban skirmishes. A true “Tank of Victory”, preserved by photos and footage of military chronicles from Berlin’s siege. The T-34-85E was the latest modification of one of the best (and most produced) tanks of WWII, with a powerful 85-mm gun and better armour, but with the same mobility as earlier versions of the T-34. It is still in military service in some nations around the world.

  • All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.
  • With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • To add this DLC to your account, launch the War Thunder client from Steam library and press the Steam Login button at the startup screen in the game.
  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
983440.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 简体中文, 俄语*, 日语*, 波兰语*, 捷克语*, 土耳其语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
